ISSUE.TITLE: How can i provide devices from multiple machines
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Thanks for Sorccu's help I have got STF running via stf local. Can i just make a provider with adbd.service and stf-provider@.service on the other PCs to provide devices from multiple machines?
